root.para: For entities that have not yet adopted the amendments in ASU No. 2017-12 as of the issuance date of ASU No. 2019-04, the effective dates and transition requirements for the amendments to FASB ASC 815 are the same as the effective dates and transition requirements in ASU No. 2017-12.

For entities that have adopted the amendments in ASU No. 2017-12 as of the issuance date of ASU No. 2019-04, the effective date is as of the beginning of the first annual period beginning after the issuance date of ASU No. 2019-04. For those entities, early adoption is permitted, including adoption on any date on or after the issuance of ASU No. 2019-04.
